page.title: 20TILLICOULTRY QUARRY
page.content: The biggest{landmark}in Tillicoultry has to be the{Quarry.}It is on the site of the Castle Mill,on part of Wood Hill. It quarries whin-stone, which provides bottoming for roads. The quarry is a{cause of concern}for people living in Tillicoultry. They have started a{campaign}to close it down. The ground shakes when lorries go back and forth,and buildings vibrate. The lorries also make a lot of noise and dust. When there is going to be a blast,a horn goes off followed by a mighty earth-shattering explosion. The whole site is very ugly and unfortunately can be seen for miles.
